title: HACS Repository Manifest (hacs.json)
description: JSON schema for the hacs.json configuration file used by HACS (Home Assistant Community Store) to define repository metadata, release settings, and distribution options for custom integrations, plugins, themes, and other Home Assistant extensions.

name.description: The display name that will be used in the HACS UI

content_in_root.description: Indicates whether the content is in the root of the repository as opposed to in a subdirectory

zip_release.description: Indicates whether the content is in a zipped archive when releases are published on GitHub (only supported for integrations)

filename.description: Name of the file HACS should look for (only applies to single item types: plugin, theme, template, python_scripts, zip_release)

hide_default_branch.description: Tells HACS to not offer downloading the default branch

oneOf.description: Two character country code in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format
Array of two character country codes in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format

homeassistant.description: The minimum required Home Assistant version (append 'b0' to allow beta versions)

persistent_directory.description: A relative path (within the integration directory) that will be kept safe during upgrades (can only be used with integrations)
